entry.title: Happy New Year
entry.content:
The year 2020, in all respects, is a tough year.

This year, changes have taken place in both national and international situations,

leaving millions of people homeless, hungry, or even dead.

However, I believe, that everything will revive.

Flowers will bloom again.

Rivers will flow again.

And you and me will be together again.

So hold on to it,

cross difficulties,

realize dreams,

achieve the impossible.

And only then,

when the mission is finished,

may we party together,

and wish each other,

a Happy New Year.

Brian “Ender” Chen

1st Jan. 2021
